survey.note: Project friesland-campina-dessert-ua-erbc190302 has the most up-to-date Dutch translations of res tags.
survey.res: Please turn your device before we continue
Oops, something went wrong! Check the question(s) below.
Please fill answers in successive order.
Please enter a valid response in the provided box.
Please enter a valid response in the provided box, at least a few alphabetical characters.
You've reached the maximum number of clicks.

res.label: tool_finish_text
res.span: Thanks! Let's move on to the next question
Thank you! I'd like to learn more from you
You are a great help! Let's keep going

res.label: special_description
res.span: for cost management for all subscriptions combined

survey.res: Please select a marker to start.
I never purchase and drink juices or smoothies
Please navigate for at least 1 minute before getting back to the survey.

res.label: tip_cardrating_hold
res.span: Hold the button to select your answer

res.label: tip_next_page
res.span: When the arrow points right you can continue to the next page

res.label: tip_multi_select
res.span: When an answer has a dark corner then you can select more than one answer

res.label: tip_speech_to_text
res.span: Prefer talking over typing? You can use this in your keyboard to dictate the text

res.label: tip_drag_drop
res.span: You can drag and drop the item when you see this

survey.res: Please take your time to read carefully
Please highlight what you find unappealing too
Please highlight what you find appealing too
Please review the whole concept first
Thank you for being so helpful!
Please scroll down to read all options first
Or click here if you don't find anything unappealing
Or click here if you don't find anything appealing
A problem occurred which indicates you are using your browser in incognito mode. Please disable incognito mode or switch to another browser such as Chrome or Firefox.
I'm not interested in either of these

div.p: Welcome on the website of Traveler! I am curious which travel packages do appeal to you most. A few different sets wil be shown and you can choose which you like the best. If there is really none that appeals to you within that set, you can let me know by saying "I'm not interested in either of these"

survey.note: TODO: Add attribute after="q4" to the style element below to enable the custom background after a certain question. New: we also need it before the screener so we can have a background on the 'no_js', 'no_ie' and 'no_session_storage' pages
survey.exec:
# DO NOT REMOVE - PLEASE FILL IN THE NUMBER OF SECTIONS DEFINED IN THE QUESTIONNAIRE
p.numberOfSections = 1 p.currentSectionIndex = 0

# DO NOT REMOVE - FUNCTION NEEDED FOR ADVANCED SORTING
# Add the below attributes to the question attributes, in order to shuffle the rows, # but keeping some of the rows in a specific order (and grouped) # You can have multiple sorted row-groups, by adding the function call multiple times, # divided by a semicolon.
# shuffle="rows,groups" # exec="group_rows_with_order(configurator, ['r7', 'r15', 'r16']); group_rows_with_order(configurator, ['r12', 'r10', 'r11']); group_rows_with_order(configurator, ['r4', 'r5']);"
def group_rows_with_order( question, grouped_rows ): current_order = [row.index for row in question.rows.order] new_order = []
grouped_rows = [question.attr(row).index for row in grouped_rows] first_item_index = current_order.index(grouped_rows[0])
current_order.insert(first_item_index, grouped_rows)
for row in current_order: if row == grouped_rows: new_order = new_order + row elif row not in grouped_rows: new_order.append(row)
question.rows.order = new_order
survey.html:
Please enable JavaScript to view this survey.
You can find instructions here.
After enabling JavaScript, please reload your browser.
survey.note: This is where the menu gets automatically inserted by the Gulp / `gulpfile.js`.

radio.label: hidStart
radio.title: Start from section.. (crude jump)

comment.span: WARNING!: Not starting at the beginning means that variables are not being set which need to be set in order for the survey to function properly.
DO NOT change this when testing routing and/or logic!

radio.row: Start normally (suitable for testing routing and/or logic)

radio.label: user_agent
radio.title: Browser detected

survey.note: If you want to disable IE: remove 'and 0' below

block.label: no_ie_block
block.html: We don't support Internet Explorer. Please close this window and open the link you received in another browser.

div.p: Hi my name is Jess and I’m glad you’re taking the time to have this conversation with me.
Before we move on to the main topic, I would like to get to know you a bit.

block.label: b_us_rt
block.html: We would like to ask you some questions about you and your relationship with your employer.

radio.label: q1_us
radio.title: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements?
radio.row: I thoughtfully consider how my daily actions help me towards my overall goals
It makes me anxious when I have to make decisions about things in my life
Benefits help me achieve my life goals
I expect to postpone my retirement due to my financial situation
I believe my employer should help me solve my financial security concerns
I feel committed to my organization's goals

block.exec:
###################Code 1#########################
if q1_us.r1.inrange(0,3): hidq1_us.r1.c1.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r1.c1.val = 0
if q1_us.r1.inrange(4,6): hidq1_us.r1.c2.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r1.c2.val = 0
if q1_us.r1.inrange(3,6): hidq1_us.r1.c3.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r1.c3.val = 0
if q1_us.r1.inrange(2,4): hidq1_us.r1.c4.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r1.c4.val = 0
###################Code 2#########################
if q1_us.r2.inrange(3,6): hidq1_us.r2.c1.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r2.c1.val = 0
if q1_us.r2.inrange(0,3): hidq1_us.r2.c2.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r2.c2.val = 0
if q1_us.r2.inrange(0,2): hidq1_us.r2.c3.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r2.c3.val = 0
if q1_us.r2.inrange(2,4): hidq1_us.r2.c4.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r2.c4.val = 0
###################Code 3#########################
if q1_us.r3.inrange(0,3): hidq1_us.r3.c1.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r3.c1.val = 0
if q1_us.r3.inrange(4,6): hidq1_us.r3.c2.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r3.c2.val = 0
if q1_us.r3.inrange(0,2): hidq1_us.r3.c3.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r3.c3.val = 0
if q1_us.r3.inrange(2,4): hidq1_us.r3.c4.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r3.c4.val = 0
###################Code 4#########################
if q1_us.r4.inrange(4,6): hidq1_us.r4.c1.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r4.c1.val = 0
if q1_us.r4.inrange(0,1): hidq1_us.r4.c2.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r4.c2.val = 0
if q1_us.r4.inrange(0,3): hidq1_us.r4.c3.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r4.c3.val = 0
if q1_us.r4.inrange(2,4): hidq1_us.r4.c4.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r4.c4.val = 0
###################Code 5#########################
if q1_us.r5.inrange(0,3): hidq1_us.r5.c1.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r5.c1.val = 0
hidq1_us.r5.c2.val = None
if q1_us.r5.inrange(0,3): hidq1_us.r5.c3.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r5.c3.val = 0
if q1_us.r5.inrange(2,4): hidq1_us.r5.c4.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r5.c4.val = 0
###################Code 6#########################
if q1_us.r6.inrange(0,3): hidq1_us.r6.c1.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r6.c1.val = 0
if q1_us.r6.inrange(4,6): hidq1_us.r6.c2.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r6.c2.val = 0
hidq1_us.r6.c3.val = None
if q1_us.r6.inrange(2,4): hidq1_us.r6.c4.val = 1 else: hidq1_us.r6.c4.val = 0

define.label: Insurance_Products
define.row: Hospital Indemnity or Accident Medical Indemnity

Annuity
for retirement or child university saving plan etc.

pipe.label: pipeq6
pipe.case: Which of the following financial / insurance products do you currently have?
Which of the following financial / insurance products does your company offer as employee benefits?
UNDEFINED

pipe.label: pipe_q6a_c4
pipe.case: I used to be a client, but not anymore
My company used to be a client, but not anymore

pipe.label: pipe_q6a_c5
pipe.case: I am currently a client
My company is currently a client

radio.label: q6a
radio.title: How well do you know each of these companies?
radio.col: I have never heard of them
I only know them by name
I know them, but have never been a client

checkbox.label: q6b
checkbox.title: And which of the following statements describe you?
checkbox.row: I value learning about new and interesting products and services
I often look for new ways to manage my finances and save for retirement
I am willing to take risks in order to try new savings products and services
I often try out new products and services before my friends

radio.label: hidMetlifeAware
radio.title: Hidden for showing awareness of Metlife - hidden_q

checkbox.label: q6c
checkbox.title: And which of the following statements describe the way you think about the role of providing insurance and benefits to your employees?
checkbox.row: I value learning about new and interesting employee benefits products
I'm always open to new approaches to tackling business challenges
I consider myself to be up-to-date on the latest trends in employee benefits
I'm willing to implement new strategies at my company earlier than my peers

radio.label: LEAD_CUSTOMER
radio.title: Hidden for data purpose - hidden_q

survey.html: Next step! Great, good to get to know you a little bit! Today I would like to talk to you about your future and how you prepare for it. People around the world have shared how they feel about this and I would like to know if you feel the same.

radio.label: q7
radio.title: Looking at the statements below, how relevant is each statement to you?

survey.exec: if q7.r1.c4 or q7.r1.c5: progq8.r1.val = 1 if q7.r2.c4 or q7.r2.c5: progq8.r2.val = 1 if q7.r3.c4 or q7.r3.c5: progq8.r3.val = 1 if q7.r4.c4 or q7.r4.c5: progq8.r4.val = 1

select.label: q8
select.title: Which statements do you think are the most important?
select.comment: Please choose at least 1 statement, and a maximum of ${countinstruction} statements, with 1 meaning the most important.

radio.label: hidq8b
radio.title: Hidden for masking purpose - hidden_q

textarea.label: q8b
textarea.title: Why did you pick [pipe: hidq8b] as your most important statement?

survey.exec: if (hasMarker('/TerritoryLeastfillQuota/*/T1')): hidTerritory.val = 0 if (hasMarker('/TerritoryLeastfillQuota/*/T2')): hidTerritory.val = 1 if (hasMarker('/TerritoryLeastfillQuota/*/T3')): hidTerritory.val = 2 if (hasMarker('/TerritoryLeastfillQuota/*/T4')): hidTerritory.val = 3 if (hasMarker('/TerritoryLeastfillQuota/*/T5')): hidTerritory.val = 4 if (hasMarker('/TerritoryLeastfillQuota/*/T6')): hidTerritory.val = 5

radio.label: hidTerritory
radio.title: Hidden for punching territory based on leastfill - hidden_q

radio.label: hidTerritoryPopup
radio.title: Hidden for punching territory based on leastfill - hidden_q

pipe.label: pipe_intro_q9
pipe.case: I learned about a different kind of insurance company and would like to know what you think. Before we start please take your time to learn about this company.
I learned about a different kind of insurance company and would like to know what you think. Before we start please take your time to learn about this company.

survey.html:
A different kind of company[pipe: pipe_intro_q9]
[pipe: hidTerritory]

pipe.label: pipe_q10_0
pipe.case: employee benefits companies (dental, vision, short term disability, critical illness, etc.)

pipe.label: pipe_q10_3
pipe.case: easy to understand how this company would address my needs
easy to understand how this company would address my needs

pipe.label: pipe_q10_5
pipe.case: relevant to me personally
relevant to my company

pipe.label: pipe_q10_6_oe
pipe.case: So you don’t think it understands your needs, why not?
So you don’t think it understands your company's, why not?

select.label: q10_0
select.title: So tell me, what do you think about the company compared to other insurance companies (e.g. life, auto, home) [pipe: pipe_q10_0]? ${hidTerritoryPopup.r1.text}

comment.div: Not relevant for you? Why not?

title.div: I would like to learn more about this company
I would consider buying this company's products or services
Why wouldn’t you consider this company?
Why would you consider this company?

pipe.label: pipeq11r11
pipe.case: Understands my needs
Understands my company’s needs
UNDEFINED

radio.label: q11
radio.title: Does this attribute describe this company, given what you have just seen? ${hidTerritoryPopup.r1.text}

row.label: r1
row.p: Expert in the field of insurance

row.label: r2
row.p: A company that flexes with me

row.label: r19
row.p: Different from other financial services companies

row.label: r20
row.p: Different from other companies I interact with

survey.note:
Consultant comment for q12: show pop up of assigned benefit statement
Consultant comment for q12 answer options: Ranging from Very unlikely to Very likely

radio.label: q12
radio.title: If someone close to you would tell you about this company, what would you do? ${hidTerritoryPopup.r1.text}
radio.row: I would discuss this company with my insurance agent / financial advisor
I would tell others about this company
I would share this with my social network
I would prefer this company over others that offer similar services
I would consider switching to this company

checkbox.label: q12b
checkbox.title: Which of these attributes describes how you feel about this company?
checkbox.row: I feel close to this company
I share the same values as this company
This company cares about the people they insure

textarea.label: q15
textarea.title: Jess Baker

row.label: q1
row.div: For a company to make a promise is not enough, it needs to be real. What should this company concretely do to make this a reality?

textarea.row: Thanks, let’s move on to the next topic!

radio.label: q15b
radio.title: You mentioned these statements are most important to you. How well do you think this company addresses these statements? ${hidTerritoryPopup.r1.text}

survey.html:
About the company Now, I want to understand how you feel about the insurance company behind the idea that you just reviewed.
For this section, please assume that the insurance company plans to deliver upon the idea you reviewed. ${hidTerritoryPopup.r1.text}

text.label: q19
text.title: Which insurance company that you know of is most likely to make this a reality? ${hidTerritoryPopup.r1.text}

select.label: q20
select.title: And from this list of companies, which 3 are most credible to make this a reality? ${hidTerritoryPopup.r1.text}
select.comment:
Please select 3 companies in order of credibility with 1 meaning most credible.
Click to select, click again to deselect / reorder.

radio.label: pipeImgBrandLogo
radio.title: Hidden for punching brand logo - hidden_q

textarea.label: q21a
q21b
textarea.title: Why do you think none of these companies is credible to make this a reality? ${hidTerritoryPopup.r1.text}

survey.html: MetLifeNow, I would like to tell you that the company behind this idea is MetLife.

textarea.label: q40
textarea.title: What are your impressions now that you know MetLife is the company that plans to deliver this idea?

select.title: Now that you know that MetLife is the company that plans to deliver this idea, how would you rate MetLife on each of the following? ${hidTerritoryPopup.r1.text}

comment.div: Not relevant for you? Why not?

title.div: I would like to learn more about this company
I would consider buying this company's products or services

comment.div: Why wouldn’t you consider this company?
Why would you consider this company?

radio.label: q42
radio.title: How credible is it that MetLife plans to deliver on this idea? ${hidTerritoryPopup.r1.text}

radio.label: q43
radio.title: Do you believe that MetLife is being authentic with this idea? ${hidTerritoryPopup.r1.text}

survey.html: Social NeedsThank you so much for your input so far! In this next section, I would like to understand your views on different needs of society, in general. For this section, we will call these needs “social needs”.

radio.label: q16a
radio.title: How relevant are each of these social needs to you personally?

select.label: q16
select.title: Which 3 of these social causes are most relevant to you personally?
select.comment: Please select 3 causes in order of relevance with 1 meaning most relevant. Click to select, click again to deselect / reorder.

radio.label: pipeq17
radio.title: Hidden for piping purpose - hidden_q

textarea.label: q17
textarea.title:
Why is this social cause most important to you?
[pipe: pipeq17]

radio.label: q44
radio.title:
If, as part of delivering on the idea you just read, MetLife were to support this social need, how unique or different would that make MetLife from other insurance companies? ?
[pipe: pipeq17]

select.label: q17a
select.title: Which 3 of these needs can best be addressed by a company / business (as opposed to the government or other public institutions)?
select.comment: Please select 3 causes in order of best being addressed by a company with 1 meaning best addressed by a company. Click to select, click again to deselect / reorder.

select.label: q18
select.title: Thinking about the MetLife idea you just read, which 3 social needs best fit the MetLife idea? ${hidTerritoryPopup.r1.text}
select.comment: Please select 3 causes in order of fit to the MetLife idea with 1 meaning offering best fit. Click to select, click again to deselect / reorder.

select.label: q18a
select.title: Assuming Metlife wanted to “Build a more confident future for people”, which 3 social causes fit best with that goal? ${hidTerritoryPopup.r1.text}
select.comment: Please select 3 causes in order of fit with 1 meaning it fits best with that goal. Click to select, click again to deselect / reorder.

survey.html: Insurance Great thank you for your input so far. We are all done with discussing company! To understand your feedback a bit better, I now would like to ask you a final few questions about how you think about insurance in general.

radio.label: q22
radio.title: Which insurance company is the provider of your..?

radio.label: Metlife_Owner
radio.title: Hidden for quota - hidden_q

text.label: q22a
text.title: And what is the other company?

pipe.label: pipeq23r4
pipe.case: I used to have MetLife insurance, but not anymore
My company used to have MetLife insurance, but not anymore
UNDEFINED

pipe.label: pipeq23r5
pipe.case: I currently have insurance from MetLife
We currently offer MetLife employee benefits
UNDEFINED

radio.label: q23
radio.title: The company behind this is MetLife. How familiar were you with MetLife before participating in this study?
radio.row: I had never heard of MetLife
I just knew MetLife by name

radio.label: q24
radio.title: To what extent do you agree with the following statements about insurance?
radio.row: I am well informed about insurance products
I shop around for the lowest priced insurance products
I like to do my own research before taking insurance decisions
I expect to be able to maintain my standard of living in retirement
I keep careful track of my insurance products
I trust insurance companies to treat me fairly and honestly
I trust insurance advisors to treat me fairly and honestly
I rely on insurance advice from professionals

survey.html: Before you leaveI hope we’ll meet again soon! To make the next time just as fun, or even better, can you give me some pointers?

select.label: evaluater1
select.title: I was well able to give my opinion

select.label: evaluater2
select.title: Felt like a nice conversation

select.label: evaluater3
select.title: Length of the interview

select.label: evaluater4
select.title: Easy to fill out

textarea.label: evaluate_oe
textarea.title: Do you have any other feedback for us?

survey.note: Important: These hidden data questions need to be part of the last (evaluation) page.

textarea.label: question_metric_data
textarea.title: Question metric data

survey.note: Check the Boilerplate for the keyword "metric" for additional "hidden data question" examples for recording question metrics.
survey.html: That was it!I really liked talking to you. Thank you very much for your time!
